channel.title: Meadows on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Meadows on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LfE 22: To the new apartment
item.description: 12/03/2010 Hi So the shift happened a week ago. The new house is well set now and quite nice. I have assimilated the neighbourhood and cognitively accepted my surroundings.

item.title: LfE 14: Traveling to Slough
item.description: 15/12/2009 Hello everyone! Hope this letter finds you all in good health. My adventures are more mobile now. Iâ€™m on the train to Slough to visit family for the holidays.
